page.title: 19ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: Thanks are given to all those people living in the 12 grid squares who helped compile the information for this project. Particular thanks are given to the owners of: Earls Hall, Frowick Hall, The Beehive Tang Hall, The Brace and Pistols, The Turkey Farm,Mr. and Mrs O'Boyle who gave us the use of their home 'Elcombe Farm', The owners of Park Farm,Elm Farm, and Lamb Farm. The shop owners and finally parents and volunteer helpers from the area who supervised the school pupils taking part in the project.
